title: FPGA-Based Digital Signal Processor
description: High-performance DSP system implemented on Xilinx FPGA with Verilog/VHDL. Features real-time audio processing, FFT algorithms, and custom IP cores for signal filtering and modulation.

title: Embedded IoT Sensor Network
description: Wireless sensor network using ARM Cortex-M microcontrollers with custom PCB design. Implements low-power communication protocols and real-time data acquisition for environmental monitoring.

title: High-Speed Data Acquisition System
description: Multi-channel ADC system with real-time data processing capabilities. Features custom analog front-end design, high-speed serial interfaces, and FPGA-based data processing pipeline.

title: Custom Microcontroller Board
description: Complete microcontroller development board with custom PCB layout, power management, and peripheral interfaces. Includes bootloader, device drivers, and development tools.

title: AP College Football Poll Simulator
description: Comprehensive web application that simulates the AP College Football Poll, allowing users to submit their top 25 rankings and view compiled results. Features interactive poll submission, real-time compilation, team validation, Excel upload support, and poll history tracking.

title: Algorithms & Data Structures Projects
description: Advanced algorithms coursework including Stable Matching Problem implementation using Gale-Shapley algorithm and graph algorithms for minimum spanning trees. Features comprehensive testing with multiple input sizes and performance analysis.

title: MATLAB Signal Processing Projects
description: Electromagnetic signal analysis and processing projects using MATLAB. Includes transmission line analysis, return loss calculations, and signal propagation studies with comprehensive visualization and mathematical modeling.

title: LC-3 Assembly Language Programming
description: Low-level assembly programming projects for LC-3 microprocessor architecture. Includes student record sorting algorithms, memory management, string manipulation, and lookup operations with comprehensive testing and debugging.

title: Embedded Systems C Programming
description: Advanced embedded systems projects using C programming for TM4C123 microcontrollers. Includes LCD display control with SPI communication, digital piano with DAC output, traffic light controller with finite state machines, and real-time sound generation with SysTick interrupts.
